document_data.mainbody:
The cursed Imaskari bootsNote that these boots are never referred to by name in the book they are merely described. were an Imaskari relic unearthed from the ruins of Solon by the slaves of Ambuchar Devayam.
These boots were sized correctly to whoever found them.
If worn for longer than ten minutes, the wearer would develop a terrible case of athletes foot.
